column2:
```r
lme_sex <- lmer(
  cort_B_winlog ~ 
    time_hr +
    scale(crf_time_arrived, scale = FALSE) +
    male +
    (time_hr|ID), 
  data = cort_lf
)
anova(lme_arrivetime, lme_age)

```
refitting model(s) with ML (instead of REML)

Data: cort_lf
Models:
lme_arrivetime: cort_B_winlog ~ time_hr + scale(crf_time_arrived, scale = FALSE) + 
lme_arrivetime:     (time_hr | ID)
lme_age: cort_B_winlog ~ time_hr + scale(crf_time_arrived, scale = FALSE) + 
lme_age:     scale(age_behav, scale = FALSE) + (time_hr | ID)
               Df    AIC    BIC  logLik deviance  Chisq Chi Df Pr(>Chisq)
lme_arrivetime  7 676.76 705.65 -331.38   662.76                         
lme_age         8 677.68 710.70 -330.84   661.68 1.0782      1     0.2991

```r
lme_sexX <- lmer(
  cort_B_winlog ~ 
    time_hr * male +
    scale(crf_time_arrived, scale = FALSE) +
    (time_hr|ID), 
  data = cort_lf
)
anova(lme_arrivetime, lme_sexX)
```
